shortdesc.ph: Used to set the spatial position information of a remote user or media player.
represents the spatial position of a remote user or media player.

plentry.pd: Coordinates in the world coordinate system. This parameter is an array of length 3, with the three values representing the front, right, and up coordinates respectively.
Unit vector along the x-axis in the coordinate system. This parameter is an array of length 3, with the three values representing the front, right, and up coordinates respectively.
Coordinates in the world coordinate system. This parameter is an array of length 3, with the three values representing the coordinates in the forward, right, and up directions respectively.
Unit vector of the x-axis in the coordinate system. This parameter is an array of length 3, with the three values representing the coordinates in the forward, right, and up directions respectively.
